page.title: 09BANGLADESH CYCLONE DISASTER
page.content: A concert was held in Mossley Hollins High School, on Friday, 19th July 1985, to raise money for the Bangladesh Cyclone Disaster Appeal. The function was attended by the Deputy Mayor of Tameside and many local dignitaries. Mossley has a small Bangladeshi community who raised Â£270 for the appeal. A mixed audience was entertained by: Mossley Hollins Band The Magnolia Jazz Band The Ashton Indian Community Robin Choudhury and Steve Abel Sangeet Sangam A local committee, sponsored by Manpower Services, has been established in Micklehurst, Mossley to serve the special needs of the Bangladeshi Community.
